NAME.Nominative: Martyr Callista and her half-brothers Evodus and Hermogenes

LIFE.Copyright: Â© 1997 by translator Fr. S. Janos.

SAINT.LIFE: The Holy Martyrs Callista and her brothers Evodos and Hermogenes, Christians of Nicomedia, were brought to trial before the pagan governor for confessing their faith in Christ. Having refused to offer sacrifice to idols, they were cut down by the sword (+ 309).
